mapper.insert: INSERT INTO facility (accom_number, nearby_sea, ocean_view, parking_available, pool, spa, couple_pc, wifi, family, twin_bed, barbecue, no_smoking, luggage_storage, free_movie_ott) VALUES (#{accomNumber}, #{nearbySea}, #{oceanView}, #{parkingAvailable}, #{pool}, #{spa}, #{couplePc}, #{wifi}, #{family}, #{twinBed}, #{barbecue}, #{noSmoking}, #{luggageStorage}, #{freeMovieOtt})
